articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Agreement Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Delegation Leaves for India 
   Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Social Scientists Society led by Chairman Choe Sang Sun left here on Monday to participate in the celebrations of the 30th anniversary of the International Institute of the Juche Idea to be held in India.
